

# Gadfly

````julia
julia> using Gadfly

julia> x = linspace(0, 2π, 200)
200-element Array{Float64,1}:
 0.0      
 0.0315738
 0.0631476
 0.0947214

 6.28319  

julia> plot(x=x, y = sin(x), Geom.line)

````


![](figures/gadfly_markdown_test_1_1.png)


````julia
julia> y = 20
20

julia> plot(x=x, y = cos(x), Geom.line)

````


![](figures/gadfly_markdown_test_1_2.png)





````julia
x = linspace(0, 200)
println(x)
````
